about_the_game: Orifoldium is a puzzle game where you must solve magick cubes to proceed! The demo consists of the first 5 levels of the game.
detailed_description: Orifoldium is a puzzle game where you must solve magick cubes to proceed! The demo consists of the first 5 levels of the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700HQ 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Orifoldium Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700HQ 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Orifoldium is a puzzle game where you must solve magick cubes to proceed! The demo consists of the first 5 levels of the game.
